person.name: Said Elimam
person.tagline: Engineer, Filmmaker and Music Composer from Paris
person.fullName: Said Elimam - Engineer, Filmmaker and Music Composer from Paris

about.description:
I'm a multidisciplinary creative professional based in Paris, combining technical engineering expertise with artistic vision in filmmaking and music composition. My work bridges the gap between technology and creativity, bringing innovative solutions to storytelling and audio-visual experiences.

My extensive leadership background includes serving as an official Google Student Ambassador and Microsoft Student Partner, as well as being part of the student council. This experience allowed me to travel extensively, meeting with directors, ministers, and CEOs to discuss business, and delivering talks and speeches to audiences ranging from 100 to 1000 attendees at events I hosted or was invited to participate in. This leadership foundation has been instrumental in successfully running my own personal projects, leading hundreds of volunteers who joined me in various initiatives.

Throughout my professional career, I've had the opportunity to work with multiple big international groups, tackling very challenging projects and diverse technical stacks across different environments. This wide range of responsibilities has helped me develop robust engineering skills with a strong foundation, as well as advanced analysis and problem-solving capabilities that I apply to every project I undertake.
